review: Just what I needed and price is right  Works great!!!
author: CINDY EPIFANIO "guerrooska"

review: Great product just gets aggravating when internet service is weak
author: hkhitt

review: I have had both Apple TV and Roku.  I hated the Roku setup and the inability to toggle between different Netflix profiles.  The Fire TV stick was by far the easiest setup of all 3.The only issue I have had with it so far is it refuses to switch the time zone to accurately reflect my current time.
author: Emily K. Mckinley "EmKat2"

review: This Fire stick is so dope, made my life a little more happy!
author: Sonny

review: Easy set up, works well. We are enjoying it! A little thing, but also impressed me, that the remote came with batteries. Nothing comes with batteries anymore. Enjoying our Prime streaming on the TV screen!
author: Jess

review: A seemingly easy install turned into a 2 hour job because all of the on screen instructions were in German, with no way to change language until user name, password and WIFI password were installed and accepted.  What a pain!!!
author: Roger A. Jensen

review: I cannot say enough. I cut the cable finally and I am ecstatic.  I had no idea how much I would enjoy it and have been telling everybody to cut the cable, even people at my internet providers office when I go to make a payment.  I have only had it for 2mths and I will keep my amazon prime indefinitely,  I never knew prime had so much stuff and the choices you have to put on the firestick even without prime is phenomonal.  I think this is the greatest thing since the invention of the TV.
author: Olinda Henderson

review: The Firestick has met all my expectations. I subscribed to Sling TV and got the Firestick free.  I have finally got rid of my high cable bill and do not miss it at all.
author: Steve "sjs731"

review: Not really compatable to andriod products
author: JERRY CHIN
